data.text: Events in scripture. They *are* powers and principalities (or representatives of those powers and principalities) of this world, and we’re told that those powers and principalities will drink of the wine of Babylon and participate in her adulteries.

- 1.5 oz of bourbon
- 0.5 oz of fresh lemon juice
- 0.5 oz of simple syrup
- prosecco or champagne, to top

add the bourbon, lemon juice + simple syrup to a cocktail shaker w/ ice. shake til cold + strain into a wine glass. top w/ prosecco + serve. enjoy🥂
